text: Statement from President Joe Biden on Attack on U.S. Service Members in Northeastern Jordan Near the Syria Border  —  Today, America's heart is heavy.  Last night, three U.S. service members were killed—and many wounded—during an unmanned aerial drone attack on our forces stationed in northeast Jordan near the Syria border.

First on CNN: Three US troops killed in drone attack in Jordan, at least two dozen injured  —  Three US Army soldiers were killed and at least two dozen service members were injured in a drone attack overnight on a small US outpost in Jordan, US officials told CNN, marking the first time US troops …

Three Americans killed, ‘many’ wounded in drone attack by Iran-backed militia in Jordan, Biden says  —  COLUMBIA, S.C. (AP) — Three American service members were killed and “many” were wounded in a drone strike in northeast Jordan near the Syrian border, President Joe Biden said in a statement Sunday.

Republican hawks call for retaliation after 3 killed in Iranian-backed strike  —  Sens. Roger Wicker, Lindsey Graham and others pushed for a military response.  —  Calls for retaliation began pouring in from Republican members of Congress moments after U.S. Central Command revealed Sunday …

The Trump defense industrial complex goes a bit quiet after Carroll verdict  —  ‘Trump chaos is baked in the cake at this point,’ one Republican strategist said.  —  The most notable thing about the Republican call-and-response following the E. Jean Carroll verdict was that there was barely any response at all.

Trump brags about efforts to stymie border talks: ‘Please blame it on me’  —  The Republican front-runner slams bipartisan talks in the Senate for a deal as Biden calls for emergency authority to address surging crossings  —  Republican front-runner Donald Trump said he wants to be held responsible …

Lankford defends bipartisan border security bill after attacks by Trump, GOP  —  'We all have an oath to the Constitution and we have a commitment to say we're going to do whatever we can to be able to secure the border,' the senator from Oklahoma says.  —  Sen. James Lankford (R-Okla.) …

Noem spars with CNN's Dana Bash over border deal  —  South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem (R) sparred with CNN anchor Dana Bash on Sunday over the border deal, suggesting that President Biden already has the power he needs to shut down the border and that no additional legislation is needed.

House GOP unveils Mayorkas impeachment articles despite lack of evidence  —  House Republicans held two hearings on the inquiry and have struggled to detail clear evidence of high crimes and misdemeanors  —  House Republicans announced two articles of impeachment against Homeland Security …

State of the Union  —  DANA BASH, CNN HOST (voice-over): Gone South.  —  As his GOP rival gets under his skin...  NIKKI HALEY (R), PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE: Donald, keep them coming.  —  BASH: ... Donald Trump wants to pivot.  —  DONALD TRUMP, FORMER PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES (R) …

Falling inflation, rising growth give U.S. the world's best recovery  —  The European economy, hobbled by unfamiliar weakness in Germany, is barely growing.  China is struggling to recapture its sizzle.  And Japan continues to disappoint.  —  But in the United States, it's a different story.

US historians sign brief to support Colorado's removal of Trump from ballot  —  Twenty-five civil war and Reconstruction scholars support invoking 14th amendment to bar Trump from ballot over January 6  —  Twenty-five historians of the civil war and Reconstruction filed a US supreme court brief …

First-of-its-kind campaign fundraiser in the works with Bill Clinton, Barack Obama and Biden  —  The Biden campaign is planning a spring fundraiser for the president to appear with his two Democratic predecessors.  —  WASHINGTON — President Joe Biden's campaign is trying to organize …

North Korea fired several cruise missiles, South Korea says  —  The launches followed a round of North Korean cruise missile tests last week and a Jan. 14 test-firing of the country's first solid-fuel intermediate-range ballistic missile.  —  SEOUL, South Korea — South Korea's military …
